english.segment1: Paint the lines on perfect eyes that circle the object of. My sincere affection, my undivided attention.
english.segment2: Lie where you wont see yourself in that way. And well ride to somewhere.
english.segment3: All we are is paralyzed from the face down. Were still alive with our fake smiles. When the cameras away.
english.segment4: Dont remember this. No, dont remember this. We are losing it all, but we are gaining the world with our hands tied. Your arms placed upon mine. And the sky looks so right, and youre mine tonight.
english.segment5: Lie where you wont see yourself in that way. And well ride..
english.segment6: All we are is paralyzed from the face down. Were still alive with our fake smiles. When the cameras away.
